mapper.sql: ID, COMP_ID, STREET_TERRITORY_ID, STREET_PROVINCE_ID, STREET_CITY_ID, STREET_NAME, CODE, SEQ_NO, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, DEL_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FUN_STREET
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_STREET (COMP_ID, STREET_TERRITORY_ID, STREET_PROVINCE_ID, STREET_CITY_ID, STREET_NAME, CODE, SEQ_NO, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, DEL_TIME) values (#{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update FUN_STREET set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{record.streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_PROVINCE_ID = #{record.streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_CITY_ID = #{record.streetCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_NAME = #{record.streetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ_NO = #{record.seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEL_USER_ID = #{record.delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_TIME = #{record.delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

STREET_NAME = #{streetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_STREET set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_PROVINCE_ID = #{streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_CITY_ID = #{streetCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_NAME = #{streetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ_NO = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM FUN_STREET A left join FUN_STREET_IN_SECTION B ON A.ID = B.STREET_ID LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_SECTION C ON B.STREET_SECTION_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_IN_REG D ON A.ID = D.STREET_ID LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_REG E ON D.STREET_REG_ID = E.ID WHERE 1=1
AND D.STREET_REG_ID = #{param.regId} AND D.IS_DEL = 0
AND B.STREET_SECTION_ID = #{param.sectionId} AND B.IS_DEL = 0
AND (A.STREET_NAME LIKE '%${param.streetName}%' OR C.SECTION_NAME LIKE '%${param.streetName}%')
AND A.IS_DEL = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE FUN_STREET SET IS_DEL = 1, DEL_TIME = GETDATE(), DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM FUN_STREET A JOIN FUN_STREET_CITY B ON A.STREET_CITY_ID = B.ID WHERE B.CITY_ID = #{shardCityId} AND A.IS_DEL = 0 AND A.STREET_NAME LIKE '%${streetName}%' ORDER BY A.SEQ_NO ASC
